text: Bella Neveah Amoroso Bond (6 August 2012 â€” body discovered: 25 June 2015), was an American girl whose body was discovered in a plastic bag in a Boston beach on June 25, 2015. Bond was positively identified on 18 September of that same year, with her parents being charged with her death. ==Birth== Bella Neveah Amoroso Bond was born on August 6, 2012, in Boston, Massachusetts in the U.S., to Joseph "Joe" Amoroso and Rachelle Bond. Bond spent most of her life in or around Boston. Category:Murdered children Category:2015 murders in the United States
title: Murder of Bella Bond
